com.cs4310.epsilon.buynutsproto.localDataStorage

Class LocalDataHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs4310.epsilon.buynutsproto.localDataStorage.LocalDataHandler

  • public class LocalDataHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    LocalDataHandler is a class full of static methods that allow for persistent local data storage on the Android device. Currently, these methods allow for the storage and retrieval of username and password (using Android SharedPreferences); storage and retrieval of preferred units of weight, and storage and retrieval of a search filter. Created by dave on 11/25/15.

      static java.lang.String getPrefUnitsWt(Context context, java.lang.Long mUid)
      Retrieves preferred units of weight as a string from the SQL database, paired with a userID; this database has unique entries for each user that has logged in on this device.
      static RequestFilteredSellOffer getSavedFilter(Context context, java.lang.Long mUid)
      Retrieves a saved filter from local SQL database
      static java.lang.String[] getUNamePassword(Activity activity)
      Retrieves the username and password if they were stored on this device; otherwise returns blank strings
      static int saveLocalFilter(Context context, RequestFilteredSellOffer filter, java.lang.Long mUid)
      Saves a RequestFilteredSellOffer object to local SQL storage, paired with a userID
      static void saveUserInfo(Activity activity, boolean okToStoreInfo, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      If okToStoreInfo is true, this method saves the user's username and password to SharedPreferences.
      static void storeUnitsWeight(Context context, java.lang.String units, java.lang.Long mUid)
      Stores preferred units of weight as a string in a SQL database, paired with the userID; this database will have different entries for each user that has logged in on this device.

    • Method Detail

      • saveUserInfo

        public static void saveUserInfo(Activity activity,
                                boolean okToStoreInfo,
                                java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String password)
        If okToStoreInfo is true, this method saves the user's username and password to SharedPreferences. Otherwise, it overwrites the stored values for username and password with blank strings.
        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity calling this method
        okToStoreInfo - Whether or not the method should store username and password
        userName - The username to store
        password - The password to store

      • getUNamePassword

        public static java.lang.String[] getUNamePassword(Activity activity)
        Retrieves the username and password if they were stored on this device; otherwise returns blank strings
        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity that called this method
        Returns:
        A String array; the first element is the username, and the second element is the password.

      • storeUnitsWeight

        public static void storeUnitsWeight(Context context,
                                    java.lang.String units,
                                    java.lang.Long mUid)
        Stores preferred units of weight as a string in a SQL database, paired with the userID; this database will have different entries for each user that has logged in on this device.
        Parameters:
        context - The Activity that called this method
        units - A string that corresponds to one of the units in strings.xml under array_wt_units
        mUid - The userID of the user that prefers these weight units

      • getPrefUnitsWt

        public static java.lang.String getPrefUnitsWt(Context context,
                                              java.lang.Long mUid)
        Retrieves preferred units of weight as a string from the SQL database, paired with a userID; this database has unique entries for each user that has logged in on this device.
        Parameters:
        context - The Activity that called this method
        mUid - The userID of the user that prefers these weight units
        Returns:
        A string that corresponds to one of the units in strings.xml under array_wt_units

      • saveLocalFilter

        public static int saveLocalFilter(Context context,
                                  RequestFilteredSellOffer filter,
                                  java.lang.Long mUid)
        Saves a RequestFilteredSellOffer object to local SQL storage, paired with a userID
        Parameters:
        context - The Activity that called this method
        filter - The RequestFilteredSellOffer to save
        mUid - The userID of the user that prefers these weight units
        Returns:
        The number of rows in the SQL database affected by the storage operation

      • getSavedFilter

        public static RequestFilteredSellOffer getSavedFilter(Context context,
                                                      java.lang.Long mUid)
        Retrieves a saved filter from local SQL database
        Parameters:
        context - The activity that needs the filter
        mUid - The userID associated with the filter
        Returns:
        The RequestFilteredSellOffer associated with the uid, or null if no filter is stored for that user
